name: GreatTeacher
description:
This game is about a teacher trying to complete his lesson with very ugly students in time.

The main idea of this game is to distract player as much as we can, bring chaos everywhere. And player must stay calm no matter what and don't lose control on situation.

Simple visual. Simple gameplay. Hard concentration.

Created by team "АрШэ":

Ilya Movsumov - Unity-dev, Programmer

Artyom Zheleztsov - Unity-dev, Programmer

Ivan Gorovoy - 3D-Artist

Artyom Bezpalchuk - 2D-Artist, Game Designer 

Anna Kuranda - Project Assistant

PumbaDzhun - Game Designer

Nikita Nikitin - Game Designer
